page.title: 02CLUBS IN BWLCH Y CIBAU
page.content: CLUBS IN BWLCH Y CIBAU THE YOUTH CLUB HAS ABOUT 25 MEMBERS FROM A WIDE RURAL AREA,WITH AN AGE RANGE OF 7 TO 16. ATTENDANCE VARIES WITH THE FARMING CALENDAR AS ALMOST ALL CHILDREN HAVE TO BE TRANSPORTED BY PARENTS.ACTIVITIES INCLUDE OUTDOOR SPORTS SUCH AS FOOTBALL, NETBALL, VOLLEYBALL, ROUNDERS AND TENNIS AND INDOOR SPORTS, SUCH AS POOL, TABLE TENNIS AND DARTS. THERE ARE OUTINGS TO ICE SKATING, SWIMMING AND DRI-SKIING. THE CLUB ENTERS COMPETITIONS WITH OTHER YOUTH CLUBS IN THE AREA. IT IS RUN BY A VOLUNTARY LEADER MRS SYLVIA TAYLOR WITH THE HELP OF SENIOR MEMBERS.
